name: UNWYND
description:
NOTE: UNYWND is recommended to played on iOS 6 or above. UNWYND will work on properly on iPhone 5c, iPad 3, iPad mini and above.

**Apple's Best of 2015 Games
**Editor's Choice: iOS
**Finalist on the Big Indie Pitch at Pocket Gamer Connects Bangalore 2015!
**Finalist on the Game Hack Regional Event at Game Hack India 2015!

Inspired by games like Strata and Kami, UNWYND is made with pure intention of offering a very sleek and sharp puzzle experience to the fans of puzzle genre. Most of the mobile games being developed these days cater towards casual audience and there's a lack of content for the hardcore puzzle fans.

That's where this zen puzzler comes in. It offers that challenge that's missing from these modern casual games. The game employs a simple swipe based mechanic in order to solve meticulously crafted combo - based puzzles.


Instructions:

Touch the colored blocks to spawn ribbons horizontally/vertically.
These ribbons mark blocks with similar colors in to O's and blocks with different colors in to X's.
Complete the objectives on the top by swiping ribbons and strategizing your moves.


Reviews:

"when a nicely chilled puzzler like Unwynd comes along, it's always a refreshing change of pace."
- Peter Willington, Pocket Gamer

"There are multiple solutions available for each puzzle, so UNWYND ends up quite relaxing. Without the stress of timer or stars to aim for, it’s fun to decipher things. "
- Jennifer Allen, 148 Apps

"Unwynd proved to be a nice time-killer – if you like using your brain, that is. It’s not an easy game! "
- Mary-Anne Lee, Games In Asia

"This is a great puzzle game for the casual or more advanced fan of brain-teasers, as it makes you think with colors and consider every move you take."
- Jaime Parra, 30plus Gamer

"The gameplay is fresh and enjoyable for the entire family and kids; it gives the brain a small workout to either charge up or cooldown."
- Ajay Verma, Illgaming


Features:

- Simply Swipe the blocks to Solve neat and colorful puzzles
- Multiple solutions to each puzzle
- Interesting new chapters


More Info:

- Inspired by the classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe, UNWYND features some amazing color based puzzles.
- Completely new UI and UX to suit the iOS audience.
- There is a lot of room for a lot of solutions to a single puzzle with more than 3 level packs.
- Gameplay Additions just for the iOS audience.
- Gesture based gameplay where we lay down the puzzles and players “paint” their own solutions.
-Supported Languages: English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian
